promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute simple chameleon fighting-type pokemon holding a dark lance. It can be found in arena-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or chameleon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Lancamolex, a a chibi cute simple chameleon fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in arena-like environments It has the following abilities: Horn Charge. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "chameleon", "fighting" or "Lancamolex". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, chameleon-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, orange ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Always seen in battleground locations, this adorable brawler uses its Horn Charge to engage foes. Skilled in camouflage, it delights in surprise attacks.
